questions.question: This term refers to the process of converting Python code into bytecode before execution.
This component of the Python interpreter is responsible for executing bytecode instructions.
questions.answer: What is the Python Virtual Machine (PVM)?

questions.question: This term refers to the internal data structure used by Python to manage memory allocation for objects.
This module provides an interface to the built-in garbage collector in Python.
This term refers to the process of reclaiming memory that is no longer in use by the program.
